title: How to Connect a TV to a DVD Player Without A/V Jacks

steps.title: Purchase an RF modulator and a connecting cable.
steps.content: Purchase an RF modulator and a connecting cable. This device will convert the output of your DVD player into a signal that can travel over the coaxial cable. Such cables can be found at Radio Shack or on eBay.

steps.title: Hook the composite output of your DVD player to the RF modulator, and the RF modulator coaxial output to your TV.
steps.content: Hook the composite output of your DVD player to the RF modulator, and the RF modulator coaxial output to your TV.

steps.title: Select whether you want the image displayed on channel 3 or channel 4 on your TV.
steps.content: Select whether you want the image displayed on channel 3 or channel 4 on your TV.

steps.title: Tune your TV to the chosen channel.
steps.content: Tune your TV to the chosen channel.
